A O
Facebook O
post O
by O
the O
Chief O
Press O
Secretary O
to O
Governor O
of O
Kogi B-LOC
State O
, O
Onogwu B-PER
Mohammed I-PER
, O
on O
Sunday B-DATE
explained O
that O
the O
suspected O
criminals O
turned O
the O
forest O
into O
Indian O
hemp O
farm O
. O

The O
post O
also O
revealed O
that O
the O
suspected O
bandits O
train O
special O
breed O
of O
dogs O
to O
ward O
off O
anyone O
coming O
into O
their O
territory O
, O
thus O
making O
the O
area O
inaccessible O
for O
security O
personnel O
. O

According O
to O
Onogwu B-PER
, O
during O
the O
raid O
, O
four O
of O
the O
bandits O
were O
arrested O
, O
while O
ten O
of O
their O
guard O
dogs O
were O
killed O
. O

The O
Chief O
Press O
Secretary O
, O
while O
quoting O
the O
Chairman O
of O
Okehi B-LOC
Local I-LOC
Government I-LOC
Area I-LOC
, O
Hon O
Abdulraheem B-PER
Ohiare I-PER
who O
led O
the O
operation O
, O
warned O
that O
Kogi B-LOC
State O
is O
a O
no O
go O
area O
for O
criminal O
elements O
. O
